dcterms:description: A collection of 108,077 images and their scene graphs, with a subset of 51,498 images that have 5 user-provided textual captions in MS-COCO. The dataset includes 2,416 object and 478 relationship categories, with images containing a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 40 objects, and at least one relationship.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of common objects in context, designed for object detection, segmentation, and captioning tasks.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO
